home.heroTitle: Run and walk in the New Year
home.heroDescription: Move every day in January. Choose your challenge level from 62 km to 496 km. Open a new door for every run or walk and complete your New Year challenge.
home.forRunnersDesc: Create an account and follow the progress.
home.forClubsDesc: Be active together. Everyone logs their trips and reaches the goals together.

trainingPlan.title: Training Plan
trainingPlan.noTraining: No training planned for this month.

challenges.browseDescription: Choose a challenge to join and start your CalendRun journey.
challenges.checkBackSoon: Check back soon or contact an admin to create templates.
challenges.noActiveChallengesDesc: There are no challenges available at the moment. Check back soon!
challenges.chooseChallengeLevel: Choose your challenge level to get started
challenges.runFullDistance: Run the full distance each day
challenges.joinWhenReady: You can join a challenge whenever you're ready.
challenges.alreadyJoined: You already have an active instance of this challenge. Check your dashboard.
challenges.alreadyJoinedRedirecting: You've already joined! Redirecting to your January challenge...
challenges.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please try again in {minutes} minutes.

calendar.defaultWelcome: Welcome to the calendar. Open a door every time you have run or walked at least the distance shown on the door. You are welcome to open multiple doors each day.

runLog.title: Day {dayNumber} - {date}
runLog.distanceTooShort: Distance must be at least {minDistance} km
runLog.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this run entry?

myLog.title: My Log
myLog.description: Your complete history of runs and activities.
myLog.signInRequired: Please sign in to view your log.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your challenge settings and preferences
profile.noClubsJoined: You haven't joined any clubs yet.
profile.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave this club?
profile.noActiveChallenge: You don't have an active challenge.
profile.dangerZoneDesc: Abandoning the challenge will archive all your progress. You can join a new challenge afterwards.

variant.title: Challenge Variant
variant.switchDesc: Your progress will be preserved, but your daily targets will change to {variant} distances.
variant.validationError: Cannot switch to full calendar. Some existing runs do not meet the requirements.

abandon.title: Abandon Challenge
abandon.confirmDesc: This will archive your challenge and all your progress. You can join a new challenge afterwards.

club.title: Club
club.description: See how your club members are doing
club.leaderboardDesc: Soon you'll be able to see how your club members are progressing through the challenge.
club.inviteMembersDesc: Share this link to invite new members to your club.
club.noMembers: No members in this club yet.
club.noClubTitle: You are not in a club
club.noClubDesc: Ask your club admin for an invite link to join.
club.shortDescriptionPlaceholder: Short description shown on club page...
club.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the club?

admin.title: Admin
admin.description: Manage challenge templates, club bundles, and view metrics.
admin.accessDenied: You need admin access to view this page.
admin.challengeTemplatesDesc: View and manage system-defined challenge templates.

metadata.title: CalendRun
metadata.description: Seasonal running challenges on a festive calendar.

everybody.title: Everybody
everybody.description: See how all users are doing
everybody.noActiveChallenge: No active challenge at the moment.

januaryPromotion.title: Start Your New Year Challenge!
januaryPromotion.description: The December calendar is complete. Join the January challenge and keep your momentum going!

onboarding.title: Welcome to CalendRun!
onboarding.description: Get started by joining the current month's challenge. Select your challenge level and optionally join a club.
onboarding.clubTokenHelp: If you have a club invite token, enter it here to join the club when you join the challenge.
onboarding.joinError: Failed to join challenge. Please try again.
